extension.description: A VSCode extension for visualizing URDF files and xacro files.
extension.configuration.title: URDF Visualizer
extension.configuration.packages.descrip: The path of ROS/ROS2 packages, it is used for parse `package://<package_name>` in URDF files.
extension.configuration.renderOnSave.des: Render the URDF/Xacro file when saving.
extension.configuration.reRenderWhenSwit: Re render the URDF/Xacro file when switching active file.
The background color of the 3D viewer.
The color must be a valid hex color code, i.e. #FFFFFF.
extension.configuration.highlightJointWh: Highlight joint frame at top on hover.
extension.configuration.highlightLinkWhe: Highlight link frame at top on hover.
webview.showWorldFrameHint: The red, green, and blue solid lines represent the x, y, and z axes respectively.
webview.showJointFramesHint:
The red, green, and blue solid lines represent the x, y, and z axes respectively.
The black dashed line represents the axis of the joint.
Fixed joints will not be shown.
webview.showLinkFramesHint: The red, green, and blue dashed lines represent the x, y, and z axes respectively.
webview.jointListHint:
The joint list only contains non-fixed joints, 
which can be dragged or clicked to control their position.
Double-clicking the slider will reset the joint position.
webview.clickDropFirstPoint: Click to drop the first point
webview.doubleClickCompleteMeasure: Double click or press Enter to complete the measurement
webview.escCancleMeasure: Press Esc to cancle the measurement
